column3: feels like a diner. Even the menu resembles a diner
column4: but everything has a nice tasty twist. I start salivating just thinking about Little Goat. Their Elvis Waffles
column7: Bananas and BACON is to die for. Think about all of those ingredients
column8: mixed together in every bite. Then there's their Pork Belly
column10: which although the belly is very rich
column11: is balanced with some great slaw and a bready pancake. The only let down that night was maybe the mac and cheese
